§ 754. Use of existing resources In establishing the national preparedness goal and national preparedness system, the Administrator shall use existing preparedness documents, planning tools, and guidelines to the extent practicable and consistent with this Act. (Pub. L. 109–295, title VI, § 654, Oct. 4, 2006, 120 Stat. 1432.)
Editorial Notes
References in TextThis Act, referred to in text, means title VI of Pub. L. 109–295, Oct. 4, 2006, 120 Stat. 1394, known as the Post-Katrina Emergency Management Reform Act of 2006. For complete classification of title VI to the Code, see Short Title note set out under section 701 of this title and Tables.
